Posts.Content: NmbrLcky13 wrote: I have a huge mass in my right breast, and haven't been able to eat or sleep for the last three and a half months. I am so scared it is breast cancer. I had a mamogram and a sona gram two weeks ago and this Wednesday i went and saw my breast surgeon and he looked at my mamogram and sona gram and also did a exam on me. He said he thought it was breast cancer but sent me for a core byiospsy. I won't get the results till next Wednesday.He gave me some larazepam for my anxiety and nerves. It help's some. I am dreading when they call and tell me to come in for my results, because i know there going to tell me I have breast cancer. I tried to keep positive but it hard. Anyone who want's to tell me what they are going thru, I will listen !!! Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Jun 24, 2011 01:29PM NmbrLcky13 wrote: Got my results back and was negative for cancer. What a huge relief !! The doctor said that the tumor has taken over most of my breast tissue that I'm going to have to have a mastectomy, because it will just keep getting bigger. Yesterday I went in and had another Breast biopsy. They had to put me under for that one because they had to take a bigger tissue sample this time. This was the first time I had surgery. Wasn't as bad as I thought it would be. Everyone was so kind to me and made it alot easier for me. I should get the results back for that in a week. Doctor said there is a slight chance it will come back and say it will be cancer. I have a follow up appointment on July 6th. I want to thank everyone for their thoughts and prayers, and for their kind and encouraging word !!!!
